page.title: 05Customs local carnivals
page.content: Carnivals have been going on over sixty years.In our block Seaton and Flimby have carnivals,Seaton have their carnivals in June and Flimby have theirs in July.Carnivals are very fancy things,lorries get dressed upand use wood,cardboard and all differnt coloured crepe paper.Here are some names of lorries that get dressed up in carnivals Gypsy, Ivy, Snow, Fairy, Rose, Carnival Queen, and Retiring Queen.As well as going on a lorry, poeple get dressed up as different actors. There is a lot different classes for the actors to enter. Most ofthe carnival queens go in horse and trap.After the carnival everybody goes onto the field. On the field there is a stage. A stage is where all the queens and their attendants go on and the carnival queen gives all the other queens a present.
